SELECT fb.*, ctg.category_name, a.admin_name, m.member_name, (SELECT DISTINCT f.file_id FROM tb_file f WHERE fb.board_id = f.board_id AND f.board_type = 'free' LIMIT 1) AS fileId, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_comment WHERE board_type='free' AND board_id = fb.board_id) AS commentCount FROM tb_free_board fb LEFT JOIN tb_category ctg on fb.category_id = ctg.category_id LEFT JOIN tb_admin a on a.admin_id = fb.author_id and fb.author_type = 'admin' LEFT JOIN tb_member m on m.member_id = fb.author_id and fb.author_type = 'member'

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_free_board (category_id, author_type, author_id, title, content) VALUES (#{categoryId},#{authorType},#{authorId},#{title},#{content})

UPDATE tb_free_board SET views = views + 1 WHERE board_id = #{boardId}
